page.syntax: Field_List as C = a5ws_User_File_Field_List([C format [,* request ]])

argument.name: Field_List
argument.description: A CR-LF list of user table fields used in the current web project.

argument.name: format
argument.description: Optional. A display format information to use to output field information. Options are:

item.name: Default is fieldname only. If format is specified, the output will use the "|" delimiter between values.

argument.name: request
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. This variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function. Required if run from a web page.

page.description: Retrieve a list of active fields in CR-LF list for web user table in the current project. Format - n - fieldnames, t - simple field type, w - field width.
page.discussion: Retrieve a list of active fields in CR-LF list for web user table in the current project. The field list will be determined by the current security settings and will show only fields currently used. The Request system variable is only needed if the function is used on a web page or in a web component.

section.description: The following code run in the interactive window will return a list of user table fields for the current selected web project profile.
section.example: ?a5ws_User_File_Field_List() = Email Guid PassEnt PassExp Password RedirPage RememberMe Ulink Userid

section.description: The following code run in the interactive window will return a list of user table fields and information about the fields. The width information is helpful when building a web component.
section.example: ?a5ws_User_File_Field_List("ntw") = Email|C|40 Guid|C|36 PassEnt|T|17 PassExp|T|17 Password|C|40 RedirPage|C|60 RememberMe|L|1 Ulink|C|40 Userid|C|60

see.ref: Retrieve a list of the active fields for the web user table in the current project
